tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_pledges_programs CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_pledges_programs AS SELECT afpp.pledge_id, level.name, level.amp_theme_id AS amp_program_id, sum(afpp.program_percentage) AS percentage, COUNT(*) - COUNT(afpp.program_percentage) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_funding_pledges_program afpp JOIN all_programs_with_levels apl ON afpp.amp_program_id = apl.amp_theme_id JOIN amp_theme level ON level.amp_theme_id = apl.id1 WHERE apl.id1 IS NOT NULL AND apl.program_setting_name::text = 'Primary Program'::text GROUP BY afpp.pledge_id, level.amp_theme_id ORDER BY afpp.pledge_id;
